Network traffic from internal hosts conn.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log for connections originating from internal hosts to known social media platform domains/IPs. Identify hosts exhibiting unusually high volume or frequency of connections, or connections at unusual times. Use time series analysis to identify deviations from baseline connection patterns.

Host process creation events on internal.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 (Process Creation) on endpoints. Filter for processes associated with social media or web browsing applications. Look for process creation chains or command line arguments potentially indicative of non-standard interaction with these applications. Use frequency analysis to identify unusual application usage patterns across endpoints.
